Doctor Rajat is a great doctor. He himself did my scaling and checked my previous fillings also. He is a great doctor and i would recommend him to my friends and family too.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
As soon as you enter the clinic, you find a friendly sweet receptionist who will  welcome you and inform the doctor. 
One is impressed by the standard of cleanliness maintained in the clinic. A continuous cleaning process remains active.
The waiting time is minimal. The doctor explains the need of the given treatment, and answers questions with patience. Dr. Mathur did not start the procedure till he found me totally convinced about the need to undergo that treatment. 
Both Dr. Mathur and Dr. Poonam who treated me were extremely gentle and handled the procedure in a delicate manner. Even though the procedure was long, they were gentle throughout. 
I was highly impressed by their professionalism and friendliness. I would love to recommend them to my friends and family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Dr Rajat Mathur Is one of the most professional dentists I have seen so far. He is thorough in his work and is extremely safe. I have never seen him rushing through any part of treatment. He explained the condition and the treatment options in detail. I found his clinic with good levels of cleanliness and infection control measures. I highly recommend Dr Rajat Mathur

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Rajat Mathur puts you at ease and infuses you with confidence as it becomes very clear, quite soon that he is an expert in his field.
For the second time I have had no pain or swelling of which there was a great probability of occurring.
Dr. Mathur is extremely polite and reassuring and gives good advice.

Extremely thankful and happy to have my 7 year old son treated by Dr Mathur. Exceptionally patient and highly knowledgeable, Dr Mathur has very good hands and my little son had to undergo minimal discomfort during his RCT. I will strongly recommend Dr Mathur.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
In any profession or relationship what matters most is how you make feel other person as important and how well you treat him or her. If you are a great listener the other person automatically feels being special. That is what happened with me when I visited him today. He is very professional and the support staff is well trained as well. 

This was my first sitting with him. Still many more sittings to go. 

Simply superb! That is how a doctor should be. I would definitely recommend him to my friends and relatives.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

He is an awesome doctor. He explain me the problem first so that I exactly know what I am about to face. He explained what is the actual cause of my medical condition and what we can do about it. He also gave me couple of options to deal with them that was very helpful.

He is fantabuluous with his work. The clinic has a high level of hygiene policy and the staff is well trained as well. Dr. Rajat gave me all the time to go though my previous ill-treated tooth and finally saved one of my tooth from getting a root canal. If anyone dreads to goto a dentist because of previous painful experiences, I would highly recommend you to visit Dr.Rajat to change your perception towards dental check-ups. Must visit place for preventive dentistry as well. Thank you Dr.Rajat
